summary: To impress a boy while on vacation with her divorced father, Veronique pretends that her father is her lover.
cast: Gérard Depardieu|Marie Gillain|Catherine Jacob|Charlotte de Turckheim|Gérard Hérold|Patrick Mille|Benoît Allemane|Harriet Batchelor|Sultan Beeharry|Éric Berger|Franck-Olivier Bonnet|Yan Brian|François Bruhat|Koomaren Chetty|Thierry Der'ven|Marpessa Djian|Philippe François|Evelyne Lagesse|Lorraine Lagesse|Jean-François Rangasamy|Nicolas Sobrido|Christian Theodorine
title: Mi padre, mi héroe
